Name: List code
Description: The list identifier. Must be a unique alpha-numeric code without spaces or punctuation beyond underscores.

Name: Is system list?
Description: Flag indicating whether list is required to support application functionality (value set to 1) or is purely for cataloguing purposes (value is 0).

Name: Is hierarchical?
Description: Flag indicating whether list is hierarchical (value set to 1) or flat (value is 0).

Name: Use as vocabulary?
Description: Flag indicating whether list should be used in vocabulary (keyword) lookups (value set to 1) or not (value is 0).

Name: Default sort
Description:
Specifies the default method to employ to order items in this list. Takes a numeric value indicating the sort order:
0 = Sort by list item label
1 = Sort by list item rank
2 = Sort by list item value
3 = Sort by list item identifier
